text: HEC Paris in Qatar is a campus of HEC Paris, located in Doha, the capital of Qatar.HEC Paris: de Jouy-en-Josas à Doha == Creation == HEC Paris in Qatar is the result of a partnership between HEC Paris and the Qatar Foundation, a non- profit organization created in 1995 by the Emir of Qatar Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani and his wife, the Sheikha Moza bint Nasser. == Campus == HEC Paris in Qatar campus is located in the “Tornado Tower” in the “West Bay” financial center of the city of Doha.HEC Paris exporte ses programmes au Qatar == Programs == HEC Qatar offers four types of programs, including an Executive MBA and a Mastère Spécialisé program.HEC Paris welcomes International Executive MBA Class of 2022 == Former Student == * Hind bint Hamad bin Khalifa Al-Thani, vice chairperson and CEO of Qatar Foundation == References == ==Further reader== * Category:Organizations based in Qatar Category:Colleges and universities in Asia Category:2010 establishments Category:HEC Paris
title: HEC Paris in Qatar
